alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Hardee, eastern Manatee, southwestern Polk, southeastern Hillsborough, northwestern DeSoto and north central Sarasota Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Fish Hawk to 14 miles west of Ona to near Myakka City. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Myakka City, Myakka River State Park, Fort Meade, Bradley Junction, Homeland, Alafia River State Park, Lake Manatee State Park, Hidden River, Myakka Head, Duette and Fort Lonesome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk
